Class ContinuousDistribution

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
ProbabilityDistribution
public abstract class ContinuousDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProbabilityDistribution

This interface gives the requirements for a statistical distribution with a discrete random variable.

Method Detail

getProbability

public abstract double getProbability(double x)
Given a random variable X. Return the probability of X==x. That is the probability of value x occuring in the distribution.

Parameters:
x - The value to compute a probability for.
Returns:
double The probability that X==x.

getMonotonicity

public abstract Monotonicity getMonotonicity()
Used to determine convergence of a series. Return an object that describes the monotonicity of the distribution.

Specified by:
getMonotonicity in interface ProbabilityDistribution
Returns:
Monotonicity The monotonicity of the distribution.

public abstract void setStep(double s)
Set the step size for doing calculations with this distribution

s - The step size.
